programme.title: Tayo The Little Bus
programme.desc: One day, because of Rogi's stuff in a garage, Heart has flat tires. Because of this, Heart is dissatisfied with the things Rogi has arranged but finds a favorite rear wing among new items. Heart puts the rear wing on her body, but she can't turn it back because of the errand from Hana. Meanwhile, Rogi and the little buses start looking for the rear wing, and Heart secretly tries to bring it back.

programme.title: Counting With Paula
programme.desc: Maurice loses his sailor handbook. The children head over to Treasure Island to help him find it. They discover several crabs tussling over the handbook and it gets ripped apart! The children split up to chase down the missing pages.

programme.title: Leo the Wildlife Ranger: S2 Spinoff
programme.desc: Zari finds a mudskipper in an abandoned fish tank and releases it into the sea by mistake! The rangers have to race against time to save the mudskipper and bring it back to the mangroves.

programme.title: Leo the Wildlife Ranger: S2 Spinoff
programme.desc: Kai needs the rangers' help when his Greater Green Leafbird friend absolutely refuses to sing. The rangers embark on a hunt to find the perfect songbird to complete the Leafbird's duet.

programme.title: The Deep
programme.desc: The series follows the Nekton family, a family of adventurous underwater explorers who live aboard a state-of-the-art submarine, the Aronnax, and explore unknown areas of the Earth's oceans to unravel the mysteries of the depths.

programme.title: Power Players
programme.desc: During a heatwave, Axel and the Power Players must retrieve Thermometron 9000, the thermostat-robot created by Slobot. He was abducted by Ice Crusher, and the only way for our friends to get him back is to beat the evil toys at a game of ice hockey...

programme.title: Puberteens
programme.desc: Celeste is determined to be the perfect gymnast by mastering the extremely difficult move, "The Pretzel". However, her journey to perfection soon takes a dangerous twist.

programme.title: Puberteens
programme.desc: Mike is embarrassed about crying in public after watching a film. With the help of Celeste, Hiro, and a froggy companion, Mike embarks on a mission to "man up". Will Mike ever be tough enough?

programme.desc: Wakiya finally gets the opportunity to challenge Shu on the National Tournament stage. Hoji, concerned for his friend and training partner, gives him just the pep talk he needs. Meanwhile, Ken comes face to face with his toughest opponent yet.

programme.desc: Our heroine Rose and her Filly friends embark on fun exciting adventures as they start their school life at the Royal Magic Academy of Funtasia. programme.title: Mondo Yan
programme.desc: The world has fallen into chaos and is now a stinky land of toxic cesspools and monstrous mutants, called the Chou World, run by the nasty villain Negu. High above, on top of ancient abandoned skyscrapers, a beautiful new yet fragile and harmonious world has risen: the Yan World. Protected by three eccentric Elders, three young apprentice misfits have been chosen to learn their secrets and protect this peaceful and idyllic place!
